subsection.name: Functionalities
subsection.p: Motu is a high efficient and robust Web Application which fills the gap between heterogeneous Data Providers to end users.

ul.li: Motu handles, extracts and transforms oceanographic data through a published interface on the Web;
Motu has the capacity to process huge volumes of data without service overloading or performance collapse;
Motu reports and details the activity of its process.

subsection.p: Motu allows the user to download data files though a generic web client (web browser like Internet Explorer or Firefox through the web portal, command line web browser like curl directly on the dissemination unit service). Motu is able to connect to a central authentication (capacity at server and client side) and provides advanced transaction accounting logs automatically.

All the data which can be distributed through Opendap will be read by Motu trough this interface, including then all the gridded data. The data are read through FTP because the data type is not managed by Opendap (non-gridded dataset).

subsection.name: Libraries used
subsection.p: This component is a JEE application based on the following open-source software components (not exhaustive):

ul.li: Deegree as the OGC stack for WPS
Jena and Protégé API for handling ontologies
Freemarker as the main template engine

subsection.name: System requirements
subsection.p: Even if no detailed hardware prerequisite exits, typical hardware configuration could be the following: 64 bits processor, 4 GB RAM, about 4 GB disk space available.
Note that Motu can be installed in the same computer as Thredds Data Server.
MOTU is a JEE application to deploy. The installation consists in:

ol.li: Installing a Java Application Server (like Tomcat) for MOTU, configured for CAS server
Generate certificate for CAS server dialog
Install the Motu J2EE application in the webapp directory

subsection.p: Motu have been tested with Tomcat 6.0 on a linux CentOS release 5.4 (Final), kernel 2.6.18-164.6.1.el5, x86_64.
The portability of java allows saying that it can be installed on many operating systems.
